actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to extend authorizations of appropriations for the Disaster Relief Act of 1974, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to authorize appropriations for FY 1987 for Federal disaster relief and for the administrative expenses of the Federal Emergency Management Agency for FY 1987.

titles.title: A bill to extend authorizations of appropriations for the Disaster Relief Act of 1974, and for other purposes.
